answers.answer: I'm going to assume your children have NOT been diagnosed with type 1 diabetes? (There would be a different answer to your question).That is on the low side, but not severely so. I would occasionally check their blood sugar in the morning or before a meal. If it is in the 60s then that would be too low and should be checked out.

question: What does it mean if my one year old twins have a low level? When I tested them my boy was 77 and my girl 88. That was 2 hours after eating.
title: Low blood sugar levels
